post:
Posting one more time to see if I could have any luck getting rid of this stuff.

Currently colocating with Dacentec, with the server being fully paid off (so you can take one of the 3 options as outlined here: http://wiki.dacentec.com/index.php?title=After_Rent_to_Own_Options), paid until Apr 22, 2014. Currently paying 50 USD per month (i.e., the first option), you can convert to colo-only option with 40USD per month. I've had it since Jan 2013.

Specs are as follows:

~~~~
HP SE1102 with:
Dual Xeon L5420
24 GB DDR2
4x500 GB HDDs
P400 HP Raid Controller w/ Hardware Raid 10

2x /29 block (1 came for the server, 1 block was added to me as a goodwill from Dacentec)
~~~~

Screenshot of the specs:

http://imgur.com/a/6XKqe

They can loan IPMI for free for 24 hours, and are normally pretty quick in getting back to me on whatever request that I have.

Price negotiable (via Paypal only).

Interested please PM me.

Please note that I am not a server provider and there will be no money back guarantee nor "trial period" for this server. It is sold as "it-is", obviously there is nothing wrong with the machine (it was assembled by Dacentec in Dacentec and I have never seen it myself as well) and comes with the warranty from Dacentec if you can stick to the 50/month payment plan.

Dacentec also offers 10% annual payment discount.
